name: treebark
description: Safe HTML tree structures for Markdown and content-driven apps

scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && npm run fix:esm && npm run build:browser && npm run build:browser:min && npm run copy:browser
scripts.copy:browser: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); const dir=path.join(__dirname,'../../../docs/assets'); if(!fs.existsSync(dir)) fs.mkdirSync(dir,{recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync('browser/treebark-browser.js', path.join(dir,'treebark-browser.js')); fs.copyFileSync('browser/treebark-browser.min.js', path.join(dir,'treebark-browser.min.js'));"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Dan Marshall
